short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Schedule youtube playlists videos into your Google Calendar.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows you to schedule any public youtube playlist into your Google Calendar. By selecting a range of hours and some days per week, it will tell you when you'll finish the playlist. It is a perfect tool to organize playlist courses uploaded by universities, not only will you be more organized but having a schedule will also make it easier for you to avoid procrastination.
